Plenty to keep you interested and playing. The storyline is also cute. Highly recommend!

The game is fun, but you cannot move on to the upper levels unless you earn enough stars. And that means you almost have to have a perfect game in order to open the airport area. I would rather they just let us move on without this restriction. In order to collect diamonds which can buy you valuable boosts, you either have to wait 24 hours for a free diamond or write a review like I am doing now to get one. This distracts from the fun of playing the game. And I guess we all know why the game was created in the first place. Not necessarily for our pleasure, but for the creators to make money.
